name: FLOE GUNNER
description:
This game will request fullscreen! You should give it fullscreen so you can see through the pixelate filter!!!

This game was made in 24 hours for the Game Theory Fall Jam in Burlington Vermont.

Music (and logo) by Sirmooge (https://soundcloud.com/sirmooge)

You can meet me and play for top score at Tech Jam in Burlington on Oct. 21st at 5PM!

Controls:

use WASD/arrow keys and mouse

Kill the stuff, live longer.
